Title: Majesty of Omega
Description: Majesty of Omega is my attempt, to establish the original vision of the 4x space strategy game Master of Orion III.  I want to create the whole thing, a huge simulation of a rough galaxy, where many species fight about survival and dominance. It is a game about politics and macro
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Majesty of Omega is my attempt, to establish the original vision of the 4x space strategy game Master of Orion III. I want to create the whole thing, a huge simulation of a rough galaxy, where many species fight about survival and dominance. It is a game about politics and macro
